About

I have had the enormous privilege to have spent 20+ years across Oxford, Cambridge, the MRC-LMB, doing research and enabling innovation.

With Frontier Strategy, I help life science innovators turn molecular biology and computational genomics into strategy, partnerships and business opportunities.

My style: Cambridge Innovation, German Reliability.
